snippet: World premieres, audience favorites, fresh Off Broadway hits and a Shakespearean drama are among the mix of works arriving this fall at New Jersey’s professional theaters.
abstract: World premieres, audience favorites, fresh Off Broadway hits and a Shakespearean drama are among the mix of works arriving in fall at New Jersey’s professional theaters (Metropolitan/New Jersey).
lead_paragraph: World premieres, audience favorites, fresh Off Broadway hits and a Shakespearean drama are among the mix of works arriving this fall at New Jersey’s professional theaters.

headline.seo: In New Jersey, a Fall Theater Season of Infinite Variety
